queries.compiledQueryString: select stop_id from GTFS.stop_times where trip_id = '${inputs.selected_trip.value}'
queries.inputQueryString: select stop_id from GTFS.stop_times where trip_id = '${inputs.selected_trip.value}'

queries.compiledQueryString: select * from GTFS.shapes where shape_id in (select shape_id from GTFS.trips where trip_id like '${inputs.selected_trip.value}')
queries.inputQueryString: select * from GTFS.shapes where shape_id in ${trips_shapeid}

queries.compiledQueryString: select shape_id from GTFS.trips where trip_id like '${inputs.selected_trip.value}'
queries.inputQueryString: select shape_id from GTFS.trips where trip_id like '${inputs.selected_trip.value}'

queries.compiledQueryString: select trip_id from GTFS.trips where route_id = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'
queries.inputQueryString: select trip_id from GTFS.trips where route_id = '${inputs.selected_route.value}'

queries.compiledQueryString: select *, route_id || ' ' || route_long_name as displayName from GTFS.routes
queries.inputQueryString: select *, route_id || ' ' || route_long_name as displayName from GTFS.routes

queries.compiledQueryString:
select 
    GTFS.trips.trip_id, trip_headsign || ' - ' ||
    case 
    when monday = true then 'Monday'
    when tuesday = true then 'Tuesday'
    when wednesday = true then 'Wednesday'
    when thursday = true then 'Thursday'
    when friday = true then 'Friday'
    when saturday = true then 'Saturday'
    when sunday = true then 'Sunday'
    end || ' @ ' || arrival_time as displayName
from (GTFS.trips NATURAL JOIN GTFS.calendar) INNER JOIN GTFS.stop_times on GTFS.trips.trip_id = GTFS.stop_times.trip_id and GTFS.stop_times.stop_sequence = 1
where GTFS.trips.trip_id = '${inputs.selected_trip.value}'
queries.inputQueryString:
select 
    GTFS.trips.trip_id, trip_headsign || ' - ' ||
    case 
    when monday = true then 'Monday'
    when tuesday = true then 'Tuesday'
    when wednesday = true then 'Wednesday'
    when thursday = true then 'Thursday'
    when friday = true then 'Friday'
    when saturday = true then 'Saturday'
    when sunday = true then 'Sunday'
    end || ' @ ' || arrival_time as displayName
from (GTFS.trips NATURAL JOIN GTFS.calendar) INNER JOIN GTFS.stop_times on GTFS.trips.trip_id = GTFS.stop_times.trip_id and GTFS.stop_times.stop_sequence = 1
where GTFS.trips.trip_id = '${inputs.selected_trip.value}'
